level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 1102(f) of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-144
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-144, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1219.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-169
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-169, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1217.11.
